QuestData.Title: The Rabbitsfoot
QuestData.Description: The Broketooth hozen stole our Rabbitsfoot! He was the grummle with the biggest luckydo.$b$bThis is very bad fortune indeed. Please, $r, we need our Rabbitsfoot back. We need his good fortune back.$b$bCan you search the Broketooth Outpost for him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Brother Rabbitsfoot from the Broketooth Outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: Look what Broketooths and Knucklethumps did to grummle waystation. Hardly a luckydo to be found.$b$bGrummles had a deal with the hozen. We give them food, and they don't ravage. Whenever they think to ravage, Shado-Pan remind them not to ravage.$b$bBut all of Shado-Pan are away defending the wall now. And the hozen want more food than the grummles have.
